item.title: Shoko Metadata 1.5 Released
item.description: It has been a whole year since the last release! This release fixes an issue with subdirectories, now you can store your anime in whataver way you want without Plex being stupid and it also adds new features such as single season ordering. For a complete list of changes, check out the Changelog. Fixing the issue with subdirectories Plex has a problem with series being stored in subdirectories as it detects everything as a single series.
